name: dreamer's isle
description:
The plants are beautiful. The island is lovely. You're so glad to be here. Right?

You wake up on the mysterious island of "dreamer's isle" and decide to explore. Everything here is beautiful, wonderful, too good to be true. Is it real? Do you really care?

This game may be updated periodically; check to ensure you have the most recent version. dreamer's isle is an HTML file which needs to be downloaded but will then play in your browser.

A short visual novel made for A Game By Its Cover 2018, based off of 'dreamberry island' by David Kraus.
